knimeNode.name: DistanceMatrixConverter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Creates a distance matrix from an input data table.

fullDescription.intro: Creates a distance matrix from a given input table. The format of the input data should be [x, y, distance] with x and y being integers and distance as a double value. Please note that this Node assumes that the input data is symetrical, so the distance between two points "X" and "Y" should be identical with the distance between "Y" and "X". Also this node assumes that the distance between the point "X" and itself should be 0.
fullDescription.option: The Column which should be used as the X Column, must be compatible with the type Integer
The Column which should be used as the Y Column, must be compatible with the type Integer
The Column which should be used as the Distance, must be compatible with the type Double

ports.inPort: A table with three columns. The first two columns must be of the type Integer, the third column must be compatible with the type Double
ports.outPort: A distance matrix, either triangular or complete, depending on the configuration.
